Famous Barcelona bullring may be converted into Europe’s biggest mosque. The Emir of Qatar has reportedly agreed to roll out €2.2 billion ($2.99 bn) to convert Barcelona's Monumental bullring into a 40,000-capacity mosque, the biggest in Europe, by 2020, if the city council approves the project.
"Russia will not sit idly by as jihadists press Iraq assault"

Pakistan family slits throats of young couple over love marriage: A young couple in Pakistan were tied up and had their throats slit with scythes after they married for love, police said Saturday. The 17-year-old girl and 31-year-old man married on June 18 without the consent of their families ...
